abstract: Parkcentral Capital Management, which on Tuesday said it was liquidating a fixed-income hedge fund because it was “no longer viable,” missed a margin call just days before the announcement, according to a lawsuit filed by JPMorgan Chase against the investment firm.
lead_paragraph: Parkcentral Capital Management, which on Tuesday said it was liquidating a fixed-income hedge fund because it was “no longer viable,” missed a margin call just days before the announcement, according to a lawsuit filed by JPMorgan Chase against the investment firm.
